title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: D. P.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and blue ink, brush and blue and red watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: D. P.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Monogram comprised of a "D" the curved element in outline, the vertical element formed by three blue bands superimposed upon a smaller solid red "P", the rounded element forming the center of the "D".
On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
Puiforcat fabrication #:
